ProductInfo.Features:
ViewPad E70, 7" Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich tablet with Wi Fi 802.11 b/g/n; High resolution 800x480 screen with capacitive multi-touch
Pre-installed most popular apps:Including Swype, Twitter, TuneIn Radio, Kindle for Android, Amazon Appstore for Android (US only), 1Mobile Market (worldwide) & more; Fast Cortex-A9 GHz processor
512MB RAM DDR3; 4GB memory storage and expandable memory up to 32GB via Micro SD card; Support 1080p playback via mini HDMI output
G-Sensor built in for auto rotation; Front camera for video chat or video conferencing
USB client & host and Micro USB for power charging; Microphone and speakers built in
Texas Instruments arm dual core cortex a9 omap 4 Processor 1.5GHz
ProductInfo.Name: Viewsonic E70_US1 ViewPad 7-Inch Tablet
